p.k: The treasured compositions of guitarist Django Reinhardt, the founding father of hot club jazz, are engraved in everyone's memory. With infectious improvisations, Dutch guitarist Stochelo Rosenberg and pianist Peter Beets breathe new life into his music.
p.d: The treasured compositions of guitarist Django Reinhardt, the founding father of hot club jazz, are engraved in everyone's memory. Although Reinhardt missed two fingers of his left hand, his virtuoso technique was unrivalled. Dutch guitarist Stochelo Rosenberg and pianist Peter Beets now have the pleasure to bring Django's music back to life with their infectious improvisations.
